SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlertBuilder
AlertBuilder is a helper class to build Alert popups of type INFO (by default), WARNING or ERROR It allows to add a header, content and stack trace to the popup and then display it with the show() method or get it with the build() method
App
 
Card
The Card class represents a flashcard with a question on one side and an answer on the other.
CardController
Controller for the CardView.
CardController.Listener
Interface used by the upper controller to listen to events from this controller
CardException
The CardException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to flashcards.
CardPicker
The CardPicker class is used to pick a card from a list of cards.
CardType
The CardType enum is used to represent the type of a card.
CardView
The view for the CardController.
CardView.Listener
The listener interface for the view
CardVisitor
each card implement a method accept() who calls visit(this) to know the card type
Client
The Client class is used to communicate with the server.
Client.OnEventListener
Listener class to override depending on where it is initialized
ClientHandler
Class handling a single Client, called on each new Client connection
Controller
This is the controller class for the application.
ControllerFactory
This is the ControllerFactory (doesn't manage EditCardController and StudyController)
Database
The Database class is a facade that provides a simplified interface to a flashcard database.
DatabaseException
The DatabaseException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to a flashcard database.
DatabaseExceptionType
 
DatabaseRanking
The DatabaseRanking class is used to handle the Ranking table in the database.
Deck
Model class for the deck of cards.
DeckCardException
The DeckCardException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to the link between the card and the deck.
DeckException
The DeckCardException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to a flashcard deck.
DownloadDeckController
Controller for the download deck view.
DownloadDeckView
The DownloadDeckView class represents a view for downloading decks.
DownloadDeckView.Listener
 
EditCardController
Controller Class that creates a new card and modifies an existing card.
EditCardView
This class represents an edit card view.
EditCardView.Listener
The listener interface for handling card registration.
EditContentDeckController
Controller for the menu of the content of a deck
EditContentDeckView
This class represents a view for editing the content of a deck.
EditContentDeckView.Listener
The listener interface for handling deck content editing.
EditDeckController
Controller for the Deck editor menu
EditDeckView
This class represents a view for editing a deck.
EditDeckView.Listener
The listener interface for the EditDeckView class.
EditHoleCardController
Controller Class that creates a new hole card and modifies an existing hole card.
EditHoleCardView
This class represents a view for editing hole cards.
EditHoleCardView.Listener
The listener interface for handling HoleCard registration.
EditMultiChoiceCardController
Controller Class that creates a new MultiChoice card and modifies an existing MultiChoice card.
EditMultiChoiceCardView
This class represents a view for editing multi-choice cards.
EditMultiChoiceCardView.Listener
The listener interface for handling multi-choice card registration.
EditPasswordController
This is the controller for the Change password menu.
EditPasswordView
The EditPasswordView class represents the view for editing the password.
EditPasswordView.Listener
 
FreeCardPicker
Free Card picker is the class used to pick the next card shown when studying in free mode.
FreeMultiChoiceCardController
Controller for the multi choice card in free study mode.
FreeMultiChoiceCardController.Listener
The listener interface for receiving events from the controller.
FreeStudyController
Controller for the free study mode.
HoleCard
The HoleCard class represents a flashcard with a question with a hole on one side and an answer on the other.
HoleCardController
The controller for the HoleCardView.
HoleCardView
The view for the HoleCardController.
HoleCardView.Listener
The listener of the HoleCardView.
JsonCardAdapter
Adapter class use when we write a Card object in a JSON file (supports inheritance) Otherwise, when reading from a JSON file, Gson will not know which class to use to create the object, and will use the default class, Card.
LeaderBoardController
Controller for the LeaderBoard view.
LeaderBoardView
The LeaderBoardView class is responsible for displaying the leaderboard and deck list.
LeaderBoardView.Listener
 
LogController
This is the controller for the Login Menu.
LogMenuView
The LogMenuView class represents the view for the login menu.
LogMenuView.Listener
 
Main
This is the Class starting the program.
MainMenuController
This is the controller for the Main menu.
MainMenuView
The MainMenuView class represents the view for the main menu.
MainMenuView.Listener
 
Modular
The Modular class is used to randomize the variables in a question and answer of a card with modular option enabled.
MultiChoiceCard
The MultiChoiceCard class represents a flashcard with a question on one side and multiple answers on the other.
MultiChoiceCardController
The controller for the MultiChoiceCardView and manages its behavior.
MultiChoiceCardView
The view for the MultiChoiceCardController.
MultiChoiceCardView.Listener
The listener of the MultiChoiceCardView.
Observable<IListener>
The type Observable.
Packet
This class represents a packet sent over the socket.
PacketBuilder
Builder in the builder designer pattern meant for more flexible and easier Packet manipulation
PacketDirector
Director class in the builder design pattern
RankingException
The RankingException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to flashcard rankings.
RankRow
This class represents a row in the leader board
ScoreBasedCardPicker
ScoreBasedCardPicker is the class used to pick the next card shown when studying.
ScoreController
A controller that will register a new record if the player's score is higher than the record.
ScoreView
A view that displays the current record of the deck and the score of the game in free study mode.
ScoreView.Listener
 
Screen
 
ScreenChanger
The interface Screen changer.
SelectCardTypeController
Controller for the Card choice creation menu
SelectCardTypeView
This class represents a view for selecting the type of card to create.
SelectCardTypeView.Listener
The listener interface for handling card type selection.
Server
Server class, run this to start the server.
StandardCard
The StandardCard class represents a flashcard with a question on one side and an answer on the other.
StandardCardController
The controller for the standard card.
StandardCardView
The view for the StandardCardController.
StandardCardView.Listener
The listener interface for the StandardCardView It extends the CardView.Listener, so it can also listen to the CardView events
StudyController
Controller for the study mode.
TestCard
 
TestDatabase
 
TestImportExport
 
Type
This enum represents the type of packet sent over the socket.
UploadDeckController
Controller for the UploadDeck view.
UploadDeckView
The UploadDeckView class represents the view for uploading a deck.
UploadDeckView.Listener
 
User
The type User.
UserException
The UserException class is used to handle exceptions that are related to flashcard users.
WelcomeController
This the controller for the Welcome Menu.
WelcomeView
The WelcomeView class represents the view for the welcome screen.
WelcomeView.Listener
